channel.title: Remove a certain item from all users?
channel.description: I'm just wondering if this is possible, if it don't flame me for asking. Is it possible to make a command delete a certain item from everyone's account no matter where it is. Like it would delete the item from their bank, inventory, and equipment if thats where it was.

item.title: Remove a certain item from all users?
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

Well thats common sense java but For the characters that have tested and used my server I don’t want to log into each one individually to remove items I don’t want them to have now. And I don’t want to delete all the characters…

Read full topic

item.title: Remove a certain item from all users?
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

-Legend-:

I don’t have one either, but its the closes thing I have.

Well it deletes the character files stated by paths, I’m sure I can find out how to change it to delete an number from a file, or a line, like “character-bank = (x) 1049 (y)” Where x can be any of the spaces in the bank stated by a variable and y can be the amount of the item, but I don’t know if I can do that with a bat file.

item.source: Remove a certain item from all users?

item.title: Remove a certain item from all users?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

This deletes all character files…Play around with it till you get it right I guess ;).

@echo off
:menu
COLOR 0a
echo This utility can be used to clear all of the current character information
echo WARNING: Once you use this, there will be no way to recover lost character files
echo.
echo Type C to clear all character files and information
echo Type E to exit this utility
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==c goto clear
if %option%==C goto clear
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==* goto error
goto error
:clear
cls
del /F /S /Q charbackup
del /F /S /Q flagged
del /F /S /Q reported
del /F /S /Q flaggedauto
del /F /S /Q connectedfrom
del /F /S /Q moreinfo
del /F /S /Q savedgames
echo All character related information has been deleted now
pause
exit
:exit
cls
exit
:error
echo An error has occured
echo Press enter to go back to the main menu
pause
goto menu

Read full topic
